about_the_game:
Jump into the world of Flavoria and experience Wizard Mukbang like never before!
This culinary experience is sure to satiate your hunger for adventure and loot.
Play as the Mukbang Wizard, a past ruler of the kingdom forced out of retirement by the evil Crimson Wizard.
The land has been plagued by a cursed rot, making all food unsafe for consumption, and most of all, sentient!
Battle cursed food in this classic turn-based RPG as you level and grow stronger towards restoring peace and prosperity to the Kingdom.
Meet a memorable cast of characters that will be sure to invoke lots of emotion as well as some laughs. Did I mention: They're fully voice acted!!
This game contains various storylines, endings, and choices that will change how your story plays out.
Featuring an OST and sound effects built from the ground up by my good friend AC PE$O, you're sure to be vibing along with the music while
exploring the kingdom.

name: Wizard Mukbang: The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Experience Wizard Mukbang like never before! You are the Mukbang Wizard, a famous food wizard. Battle cursed food and grab loot in this classic turn-based RPG as you level up and grow stronger. Gather party members and determine the fate of the Kingdom. Strange mysteries need to be solved...
